concept.title: Additional Kafka Properties
concept.shortdesc: You can add custom Kafka configuration properties to the Kafka Producer.

conbody.p: Kafka Producer destinationadditional propertiescustom propertiesKafka ProducerWhen you add a Kafka configuration property, enter the exact property name and the value. The Kafka Consumer does not validate the property names or values.
Several properties are defined by default, you can edit or remove the properties as necessary.
conbody.note:
The Kafka Producer uses the several configuration properties. The Kafka Consumer ignores user-defined values for the following properties:
key.serializer.class
metadata.broker.list
partitioner.class
producer.type
serializer.class
